alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 7:06PM MST until February 17 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...North 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Curry County and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Through late evening wind speeds will continue to weaken, so the Wind Advisory that was in effect for Wednesday afternoon is being allowed to expire. However, a backdoor cold front will move through late tonight with wind gusts up to 55 mph persisting until late Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
